comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Anyone able to locate this based on the lighthouse?

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I think that's the Execution Rocks Lighthouse in Long Island Sound: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Execution_Rocks_Light Lundin had a trial run of his boat in the L.I. sound in July 1914, according to: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F4061EFB385A12...
